attributes.action: Allow Dutch MP Geert Wilders to enter the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Regardless of what the government may or may not think of Mr Wilder's views, he is fully entitled to his views, and banning him from the UK has smiply brought more publicity to his film than ever before. As long as he does not incite violence or crime, he should be allowed to come to the UK and express his views, regardless of whether we like them or not. Freedom of speach is what makes the UK different from countries such as North Korea or Zimbabwe, once we start denting our basic freedoms, we risk loosing them all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
